DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the ability of intermediate AMD subjects to follow the instructions for use and properly operate on their own the Preview PHP in home use environment, after going through training session.
DOC.brief_title: Usability of the PreView PHP for Home Use in Intermediate AMD Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The study purpose is to demonstrate that the target population can use the system after going through a supervised training session. The PreView PHP will be operated in the same manner in the simulated setting as it will be in future home use.
